changeSet.author: system
changeSet.comment: Backfill the orchestrator_api_key for existing groups that were created before per-group API key support. Uses the legacy global API key value.
changeSet.sql: UPDATE groups SET orchestrator_api_key = 'hireology-ats-key', updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE orchestrator_api_key IS NULL AND name = 'Hireology';
